name: FamilyPrayer
0:
”Alexa, open Family Prayer”
”Alexa, ask Family Prayer who should take out the trash”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: family prayer
des: Next time you're trying to decide whose turn it to pray, just ask Alexa for help. It’s as simple as that! A family of 3 or 10, Alexa can help make prayers fun by randomly choosing a winner every time families gather for prayer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
